WorkItem.Description:
I've just downloaded the zip file, i extract this in my htdoc site folder, i enabled php_gd2, php_zip, php_xml, php_mbstring, but when i try the example file to create a simple file xls the php don't parese the intruction and result on screen the instruction not parsed. 
In my windovs vista pc i've installed Apache 2.2, Mysql 5 and Php 5.2.11, and all work fine.
Have you some suggestion to resolve this?
 
Thank you
 
Filippo
WorkItem.Summary: Setup problem - the example in zip file don't work in my pc

Comments.Message: Do you see any error messages on the screen? Can you post what you see on the screen?

There isn't an error message, is like result when you write the php page without <php? ....?> but only for $objPhpexcel instrution.......Now i'm not in office, this evening i send you the screen result of one test file.... thank you for the answare.....and sorry for my bad english...

Hi, in this pdf file there is a sesult on screen of 01simple-download-xls.php example file, i've attached also the php info and php ini file. 
I hope you help me.
Thank you very much

Filippo
Are you typing the URL in the browser address bar (file:///C:/Program%20Files/Apache%20Software%20Foundation/Apa...), or the URL (phpinfo() http://pc-filo/velvet/phpinfo.php)?

Previous should have read:
Are you typing the filename in the browser address bar (file:///C:/Program%20Files/Apache%20Software%20Foundation/Apa...), or the URL (http://pc-filo/velvet/phpinfo.php)?

Ohhhhhhhhhh.....thank you very much, before i've opened the file by finding in my disk......now i've try to call page from another php page and the test files work very well!!!....thank you very much!!
